\name{Foul.Master}
\alias{Foul.Master}
\title{Foul.Master}
\usage{
Foul.Master <- (PLAYER_NAME, PFD)
}
\arguments{
\item{PLAYER_NAME}{The name of the player}
\item{PFD}{Amount of fouls player draws per game}
}
\description{
Rate a players ability to to draw fouls
}
\examples{
Foul.Master("Lebron James", 3.5)
}
